li.label: commitment phobic
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} doesn't like to make romantic commitments, and is very unlikely to get {PAWN_objective}self into a long-term relationship.

li.label: aromantic
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} isn't interested in relationships, short or long term... {PAWN_pronoun} can't be tied down!

li.label: dislikes lovin'
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} isn't interested in lovin', though {PAWN_pronoun} might do it to please {PAWN_possessive} partner, {PAWN_pronoun} won't be happy about it.

li.label: superficial
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} makes snap judgments about the appearance of others. {PAWN_pronoun} doesn't like ugly people at all, but will worship beautiful people no matter how rotten they are.

li.label: hopeless
li.description: When it comes to love, {PAWN_nameDef} always says the wrong thing. It will take a miracle for {PAWN_objective} to find a partner.

li.label: seductive
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is a real player. {PAWN_pronoun} is skilled at getting people into bed who normally wouldn't consider sleeping with {PAWN_objective}. This could cause all kinds of problems.

li.label: shy
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} suffers from intense social anxiety, and is very unlikely to initiate conversations of any significance.

li.label: adventurous
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} likes getting out of {PAWN_possessive} comfort zone to explore. {PAWN_pronoun} likes spending time outside the colony, gets antsy when {PAWN_pronoun} stays in one place too long, and is perhaps TOO eager to get to know strangers.

li.label: domestic
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} is very comfortable where {PAWN_pronoun} is. {PAWN_nameDef} gets uncomfortable away from the colony, and isn't fond of strangers.

li.label: melodic voice
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} speaks like {PAWN_nameDef} is singing. Whether giving a long boring lecture or telling a captivating story, people listen.

li.label: homophobic
li.description: {PAWN_nameDef} does not like gay people, believing them to be abominations against traditional values. That doesn't mean {PAWN_pronoun} isn't gay {PAWN_objective}self...
